Class Monster

      public Monster(int index, String name, Monster.Type type, int maxHealth, int attack, int buyPrice)
      Creates a monster with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      index - Index number denoting the monster
      name - Name of the monster
      type - The monsters type
      maxHealth - The total health of the monster
      attack - The attack power of the monster
      buyPrice - The buy price of the monster from a shop
